item.title: Zeeno - A text-based books recommendation service
item.description: A text based books recommendation engine Find books by describing what they are about. Finding books What does that really mean? A recommendation engine is an algorithm or bunch of algorithms that help users find contents about a particular modality(video, text etc). A text based recommendation engine is one that helps users find information about some text input. Semantic Search Architecture Zeeno was built using a combination of semantic search, Sentence Transformers and Knowledge graphs,.
